alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 14 at 9:40AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. .With recent heavy rainfall, several area rivers have reached minor flood stage, or are expected to reach minor flood stage in the coming days. For the Peace...including Bartow, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The Girl Scout camp floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to 12.2 feet early Sunday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 09/29/1954. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 9.5 Wed 8 am 10.4 11.5 12.0 12.1 12.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM EDT.
